name: Shoyu Ramen Noodles
description: Classic ramen noodle dish with a soy sauce-based broth. Features a chicken wings and dashi base and adheres closely to traditional elements.

name: Kitsune Udon (Udon Noodles with Deep Fried Tofu)
description: Thick udon noodles, savory dashi broth, and seasoned aburaage.

name: Duck Soba Noodle Soup (Kamo Nanban Soba)
description: Soba noodle dish with duck meat and chunky Japanese leeks.

name: Chicken Shio Ramen (Salt Base Broth)
description: Traditional ramen noodle dish  with ground chicken and a clear and light broth
